reviewText:
Classic mexican movie. Golden movie times.  Cuando los padres se quedan solos. Is about parents in a difficult times, trying to help their children. Do their children will help them??? You have to watch it.
The other movie Una familia de tantas. Is a bout a teenager obeying her extrict  father and dealing with her own point of view in the 1940's . Veri nice movies. I do recommend it.
